name: kids-keyboard
description: A lightweight, accessible virtual keyboard designed specifically for children's typing education. Inspired by simple-keyboard.

scripts.build: npm run build:umd && npm run build:esm && npm run build:css

author: Kids Keyboard Team

acknowledgments.inspiration: This library was inspired by simple-keyboard (https://github.com/hodgef/simple-keyboard), a powerful virtual keyboard library. Kids-keyboard is a lightweight, education-focused derivative optimized specifically for children's typing learning applications.
